page.title: 05TRADE
page.content: In Staindrop we have sufficient services to support our needs. We have three public houses, the Black Swan sells bar meals, the Royal Oak and Wheatsheaf sell nuts and sweets. We also have a restauraunt and fish and chip shop We have three Grocers/General Dealers. The V.G. and the village shop both sell toys as well as food. Mr Gates sells newspapers on a Sunday. The Newsagents sells stationery and sweets also. Simpson's butchers sells meat and hot pies. The Post Office is also a bank. We also have a garage that sells Jet petrol and sweets. we have a hairdressers and a three manned police station.There is also a small branch library which is open on Thursday, luckily there is a doctor's surgery too.There is also a very attractive flower shop.
